ActivityHero | https://activityhero.com/jobs | Onsite/Full-time in Sunnyvale, CA | Software Dev, UX/Designer, Product

We're building a marketplace for summer camps & after-school classes. While helping parents, we also help the businesses behind these activities manage and grow their business through powerful SAS tools.

We're looking for highly motivated product-oriented engineers who want to contribute significantly to a complex B2B+B2C product. You should be able to work effectively in a startup environment with frequently changing needs, little direction and tight release schedules. Being a part of a small team is a great opportunity to grow & develop yourself through taking significant ownership of the product. If you're looking to have a large impact & join a talented team in working on a product that solves a real problem, this is the place for you.

Experience with Ruby on Rails and/or Bootstrap is a plus, but not a requirement.
